translation.en: [woman] The Mega Mitten. The power's not just in your hands.
translation.zh: 超级手套 力量不再浮于表面

translation.en: -[video game weapon firing] -[woman] It is your hands.
translation.zh: 超级手套 力量不再浮于表面 让你的双手成为力量源泉

translation.en: The Mega Mitten.
translation.zh: 超级手套

translation.en: For the Nextronico Gaming Entertainment System.
translation.zh: 专为下代电玩设备定制

translation.en: Now you are one with the games.
translation.zh: 你已和游戏融为一体

translation.en: [man] Coming up next , it's an all-new Saturday Morning All Star Hits!
translation.zh: 接下来 为你带来全新的 《周六早间大乱秀》

translation.en: with Skip and Treybor!
translation.zh: 由斯吉普和特雷伯主持！

translation.en: Whoa! What's up, kids? I'm Skip!
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们好呀 我是斯吉普！

translation.en: And I'm Treybor. And we're the new hosts of S.M.A.S.H.!
translation.zh: 我是特雷伯 我们是大乱秀的新主持！

translation.en: -Saturday… -Morning…
translation.zh: -周六… -早间…

translation.en: -…All… -…Star…
[both] Hits!
Wait, if it's Saturday, why are we at school?
translation.zh: 且慢 如果今天是周六 我们为什么会来学校？

translation.en: 'Cause we're finally gonna make school fun by adding TV!
translation.zh: 我们总算能让学校变得有趣了 装上电视！

translation.en: If this is school, then I say more detention, please.
translation.zh: 如果学校是这样的 我肯定求着留校察看的

translation.en: Today's assignment, watch the totally tubular cartoonage we got smashin' at ya!
translation.zh: 今天的作业就是 观看我们为你准备的超赞动画片！

translation.en: Plus, we got a super sizzlin' sneak peek at the new Johnny Rash movie!
translation.zh: 而且 我们还能抢先观看 强尼拉什的新电影！

translation.en: Yeah, and I've got a sneak peek at the doggy dance.
translation.zh: 没错 还有《热舞狗狗》

translation.en: -[funky music playing] -Skip, you're doggone crazy.
translation.zh: 斯吉普 你真是疯了

translation.en: Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!
translation.zh: 汪汪！

translation.en: We'll be right bark-- I mean, back! After an all-new episode of…
translation.zh: 我们很快汪来…回来！ 请先收看新一集

translation.en: [both] Randy! Ah!
♪ Randy ♪
translation.zh: （兰迪）

translation.en: ♪ Our best dino pal ♪
translation.zh: 我们最棒的恐龙小伙伴

translation.en: ♪ He came from long ago But lives with us now ♪
translation.zh: 远古而来 如今我们共同生活

translation.en: ♪ Adventures ♪ ♪ Are always in store ♪
translation.zh: 无处不在的冒险

translation.en: ♪ He and the gang are ready to explore ♪
translation.zh: 大家结伴去探险

translation.en: ♪ But ♪ ♪ It ain't easy being big and green With teeth that look mean ♪
translation.zh: 身体大又绿 长着丑大牙 常常遇难题

translation.en: ♪ But he's a cool skater dude ♪
translation.zh: 但他擅长滑滑板 友善又有趣

translation.en: ♪ With a good attitude you'll see ♪
translation.zh: 但他擅长滑滑板 友善又有趣 你看了就明白 （二手车）

translation.en: ♪ Randy ♪ ♪ The biggest heart in town ♪
translation.zh: 心胸宽广的兰迪

translation.en: ♪ So come on, everybody And gather around ♪
translation.zh: 大家快来 让我们一起

translation.en: ♪ And meet Randy ♪
translation.zh: 认识兰迪

translation.en: So… th… that's just it then?
translation.zh: 看来…已经没有退路了？

translation.en: I guess so.
translation.zh: 是的吧

translation.en: Would you want to, like, take some time away from each other and…
translation.zh: 要不要先分开一阵子

translation.en: and maybe just s-see where we're at?
translation.zh: 给彼此一些思考的时间？

translation.en: I don't think so, Randy.
translation.zh: 不用了吧 兰迪

translation.en: But I… I could be better.
translation.zh: 但我可以做得更好

translation.en: I think this is just how it has to be.
translation.zh: 我觉得已经没有商量的余地了

translation.en: I really do love you so much.
translation.zh: 我确实很爱你

translation.en: Love you too.
translation.zh: 我也爱你

translation.en: [man on radio] Task Force 27 to 200 North Main Street.
translation.zh: 第27特遣队 立刻前往北大街200号

translation.en: [man screams on radio] Terry!
translation.zh: 泰瑞！

translation.en: [sniffles] I should go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[grunts] -[girlfriend] No, just--
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: My legs always get kinda caught on this thing right here.
translation.zh: 我的腿总是卡在这儿

translation.en: -Your tail's hitting the-- -Damn it!
translation.zh: -你的尾巴打到… -我靠！

translation.en: [girlfriend] It's fine. It's fine. It's fine.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: -[siren stops] -Well, see ya.
translation.zh: 那 再见了

translation.en: Heather?
translation.zh: 是海瑟吗？

translation.en: No, uh… uh… Michael's upstairs.
translation.zh: 不是 迈克在楼上

translation.en: Just tell him I'm not here.
translation.zh: 告诉他我不在

translation.en: [softly] I hate myself.
translation.zh: 我好讨厌自己

translation.en: -What was that? -[music stops]
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: [whispers] I said I hate myself.
translation.zh: 我说我讨厌自己

translation.en: -Okay, I… I can't quite make it out. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 好吧 我没太听清

translation.en: But, uh, it sounds like you're saying that you don't like yourself.
translation.zh: 但你好像在说你不喜欢自己

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: [whispering] I didn't say I don't like myself.
translation.zh: 我说的不是不喜欢自己

translation.en: -I said I hate myself. -[melancholic music starts, then stops]
translation.zh: 是讨厌自己

translation.en: Now it sounds like you're sort of, uh, quietly correcting me,
translation.zh: 现在你好像在偷偷纠正我

translation.en: and I'm just very concerned about you, Randy.
translation.zh: 我只是很担心你 兰迪

translation.en: All right, Dr. Kottrellberg, seems like you fixed me.
translation.zh: 好吧 科特博格医生 你好像把我治好了

translation.en: -Really? -[softly] No.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -才没有

translation.en: All right, well, just take care of yourself.
translation.zh: 好吧 那你照顾好自己

translation.en: I forgot to tell you one thing, Dr. K, that I wish I was extinct.
translation.zh: 有件事我忘了告诉你 科医生 我要是灭绝了就好了

translation.en: Hey, Dr. Kottrellberg, can Randy come out and hang with us?
translation.zh: 嘿 科特博格医生 兰迪能出来和我们玩吗？

translation.en: Uh, I'm afraid he's… he's not feeling well, Michael.
translation.zh: 他现在不太舒服呢 迈克

translation.en: Dr. K, is Randy around?
translation.zh: 科医生 兰迪在吗？

translation.en: Maybe try next week, Shawna.
translation.zh: 下周再来吧 肖娜

translation.en: Is Randy free?
translation.zh: 兰迪有空吗？

translation.en: Not gonna happen, Rocko.
translation.zh: 他不会出来的 洛克

translation.en: [kids clamoring] Randy! Randy! Come on!
translation.zh: 兰迪 出来吧！

translation.en: Yeah, Randy, come on.
translation.zh: 兰迪 快出来吧

translation.en: Let's live our lives!
translation.zh: 一起好好享受人生！

translation.en: We're only young once! Come on, let's play!
translation.zh: 时不待我啊！快出来和我们玩吧！

translation.en: The whole gang's here!
translation.zh: 大伙儿都来了！

translation.en: [chanting] Randy! Randy! Randy! Randy!
translation.zh: 兰迪！

translation.en: I told you guys, he's still the same old Randy.
translation.zh: 我都说了 他还是老样子

translation.en: [Michael] Oh, buddy.
translation.zh: 可怜的孩子

translation.en: [Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.zh: 以下简讯后 《周六早间大乱秀》马上回来

translation.en: ♪ Rogo! ♪
translation.zh: 罗格！

translation.en: [girl] Little crafts… -[child] Can you please give me a cat? -[boy] No!
translation.zh: -小猫咪 -可以给我一只猫咪吗？

translation.en: Can't you read the sign?
translation.zh: 你看不懂这个标牌吗？

translation.en: Can't you read the sign?
translation.zh: 你看不懂这个标牌吗？

translation.en: You're in big trouble, young man!
translation.zh: 你有大麻烦了 年轻人！

translation.en: Oh no. Guess I better book it.
translation.zh: 不要啊 我认“书” 溜了溜了

translation.en: Let's just watch more Randy.
translation.zh: 我们还是再看点《兰迪》吧

translation.en: Wait, so she was just like, "We're not doing this anymore"?
translation.zh: 等下 她就说了句“我们结束吧”？

translation.en: I guess it was sort of like, we got our whole lives ahead of us.
translation.zh: 差不多就是人生还很长

translation.en: And 'cause I, like, live in a museum basement,
translation.zh: 而且我还住在博物馆的地下室

translation.en: and I don't kiss her as much anymore,
translation.zh: 我亲她的次数也越来越少了

translation.en: and I get drunk a lot, I'm maybe not a good partner.
translation.zh: 我还酗酒 算不上个好伴侣

translation.en: -What does she mean? -That's dumb.
translation.zh: -她是什么意思？ -太蠢了

translation.en: Pshh. Girls are weird, dude.
translation.zh: 女生都很奇怪 老兄

translation.en: By my calculations, she doesn't deserve you.
translation.zh: 根据我的计算 她配不上你

translation.en: [chuckles] Thanks, Digit.
translation.zh: 谢啦 数仔

translation.en: Well, we're psyched to have you back, man.
translation.zh: 我们好高兴你能回来

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们

translation.en: I mean, I… I guess she's sort of right.
translation.zh: 其实吧 她说得也没错

translation.en: I've never really pushed myself.
translation.zh: 我从来没有逼过自己

translation.en: Maybe 'cause I'm, like, a dinosaur.
translation.zh: 也许是因为我是个恐龙

translation.en: I mean, I left the only world I knew,
translation.zh: 我离开了我熟悉的世界

translation.en: got zapped into the future where I'm the last of my kind,
translation.zh: 被带到了未来 我的同类都灭绝了

translation.en: then I find out I'm not even the last of my kind!
translation.zh: 接着我又发现我的同类并没有灭绝

translation.en: You guys should be wearing helmets.
translation.zh: 你们应该戴上头盔

translation.en: -Shut up, Newton! -Go away, Newton!
translation.zh: -闭嘴 纽顿！ -走开 纽顿！

translation.en: I'll seriously kick your butt, dude!
translation.zh: 我真的要揍你了 臭小子！

translation.en: Plus, I never told you guys,
translation.zh: 而且 我还有件事没说

translation.en: but I've never really been comfortable with my body.
translation.zh: 其实我一直不喜欢我的身形

translation.en: Whoa, a house party!
translation.zh: 室内聚会耶！

translation.en: You need a pal, don't ya?
translation.zh: 你想找个哥们儿 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
translation.zh: 大概是吧

translation.en: Rad!
translation.zh: 爽！

translation.en: [drunkenly] Just admit it, human beings got lucky.
translation.zh: 承认吧 人类就是走狗屎运

translation.en: Dinosaurs should've stayed on the planet.
translation.zh: 恐龙才应该在这个星球上存活下来

translation.en: I mean, can a human do this?
translation.zh: 人类能这样做吗？

translation.en: [in a high-pitched voice] I said, can a human do this?
translation.zh: 我说 人类能这样做吗？

translation.en: Hey, Randy, take it easy, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 兰迪 冷静一点 兄弟

translation.en: I'm cool, dude.
translation.zh: 我冷静得很 老兄

translation.en: -Whoops. -Holy crap!
translation.zh: -哎哟 -我靠！

translation.en: -Fire! -[kids coughing]
translation.zh: 失火啦！

translation.en: [boy 1] Fire, man!
translation.zh: 失火啦！

translation.en: [boy 2] Oh my God, fire!
translation.zh: 我的天呐 失火了！

translation.en: [boy 3] Run! Fire!
translation.zh: 快跑！失火了！

translation.en: This is kind of crazy, right?
translation.zh: 太不可思议了 是不是？

translation.en: -You're still drinking. -What?
translation.zh: -你怎么还在喝酒？ -什么？

translation.en: The fire is almost gone.
translation.zh: 火快灭了

translation.en: There shouldn't have been a fire in the first place, Randy.
translation.zh: 本来不会失火的 兰迪

translation.en: Oh, here we go. Please, tell me how much of a screw-up I am.
translation.zh: 又来了 烦请你告诉我我有多烂

translation.en: Let's hear about my "bad hygiene,"
translation.zh: 先说说我的“脏乱差”问题

translation.en: 'cause when I say I'm brushing my teeth,
translation.zh: 毕竟我虽然说我在刷牙

translation.en: I'm actually just splashing the water around
translation.zh: 但其实只是到处泼水

translation.en: and thinking about playing video games.
translation.zh: 还一直想着电子游戏

translation.en: The point is, someone could've gotten seriously hurt here, Randy.
translation.zh: 重点是 有人可能因为火灾受重伤 兰迪

translation.en: Yeah, but they didn't. Maybe you should lighten up.
translation.zh: 是没错 但是又没有发生 别紧张兮兮的

translation.en: Hey, Randy, I think it's time for you to get out of here.
translation.zh: 嘿 兰迪 你该离开这里

translation.en: Newton? I see what's happening here.
translation.zh: 纽顿？我懂了

translation.en: Cool. Gotcha.
translation.zh: 好吧 懂了

translation.en: Bye, Heather. I hope I never see you again.
translation.zh: 拜了 海瑟 但愿永不相见

translation.en: -[sirens wailing in the distance] -And just so you know, I was lying.
translation.zh: 再说一句 刚刚是骗你的

translation.en: You suck at dancing.
translation.zh: 你舞跳得贼烂

translation.en: You can't take that blanket with you!
translation.zh: 你不能把那条毯子带走！

translation.en: -You okay? -Oh yeah. I'm…
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -嗯 我…

translation.en: I'm fine. It's just… [huffs] …he's so frustrating.
translation.zh: 我没事 只是他太让人头疼了

translation.en: I know. He's such a great dinosaur, but--
translation.zh: 我知道 他是只好恐龙 但是…

translation.en: Can be a jerk who spends so much time lounging…
translation.zh: 有时候也很混球 还动不动就躺沙发

translation.en: …you'd think he was supermodel Sasha Sinclair
translation.zh: 你可能还以为是超模萨沙辛克莱尔

translation.en: sunbathing on an exotic beach.
translation.zh: 在充满异国风情的沙滩上晒日光浴

translation.en: There you go, little buddy.
translation.zh: 给你 小兄弟

translation.en: -[inhaling] -[fireman] I don't think he'll make it.
translation.zh: 他可能要不行了

translation.en: It's like he could do anything he wanted if he just got out of his own way.
translation.zh: 他要是不自断前程 其实无所不能

translation.en: [gasps] I made it!
translation.zh: 我活了！

translation.en: Like, seriously, he could go to school for doing drum machines.
translation.zh: 说真的 他可以去学打电子鼓

translation.en: -If I could weigh in here-- -Go home, Newton!
translation.zh: -能让我说两句… -滚回家 纽顿！

translation.en: I guess… [scoffs] …Randy's just got to make his own choices.
translation.zh: 我觉得只能让兰迪自己做选择了

translation.en: That's what hurts me most.
translation.zh: 这是让我最难过的

translation.en: Just standing on the sidelines, watching him mess up his whole life.
translation.zh: 我只能站在一旁 眼睁睁看着他毁掉自己

translation.en: But I'm not his mom and I'm not his shrink,
translation.zh: 但我不是他妈 也不是他的心理医生

translation.en: and maybe I shouldn't be his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 也许我也不该当他的女友

translation.en: -[ambulance siren wailing] -You should make sure your friend's okay.
translation.zh: 快去看看你朋友的状况吧

translation.en: You're a good person, Heather.
translation.zh: 你是个好人 海瑟

translation.en: [Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.zh: 以下简讯后 《周六早间大乱秀》马上回来

translation.en: [man] The battle for Strongar rages in your hands.
translation.zh: 强强战斗 尽在手中

translation.en: The War Boars will destroy your puny Peace Prisms. [snorts]
translation.zh: 好战野猪分分钟就能击碎 你那弱不禁风的和平棱镜

translation.en: -Back off, Hammer Hog. -[man] It's Tigor, with whip attack tail.
translation.zh: -退后 锤头猪 -我叫虎哥 尾巴抽人生疼

translation.en: My hatedar is picking up trouble.
translation.zh: 我的敌人雷达发现了麻烦

translation.en: -[man] Drogg, with real-feeling tongue. -It's so wet!
translation.zh: 狗哥 舌头非常真实 舌头好湿！

translation.en: [man] Kickaroo's fingernails really grow!
translation.zh: 袋鼠哥指甲能变老长！

translation.en: And don't forget Guinja.
translation.zh: 别忘了企鹅忍者

translation.en: Fill him with water, freeze him overnight, and he makes real ice!
translation.zh: 把它装满水 冰箱冻一夜 能出冰哦！

translation.en: Hey, Skip, do you think there's intelligent life out there?
translation.zh: 嘿 斯吉普 你觉得有智慧生命体吗？

translation.en: I don't think there's intelligent life in here.
translation.zh: 反正这里没有

translation.en: Hey, that was rude.
translation.zh: 嘿 有点过分哦

translation.en: Now check out Create-A-Crittles.
translation.zh: 接下来请看《创意渣渣秀》

translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time,
translation.zh: 很久以前

translation.en: a struggling young artist by the name of David Gnubbens
translation.zh: 有一位很努力的年轻艺术家 叫大卫纳笨斯

translation.en: stumbled upon magical creatures.
translation.zh: 遇到了一群有魔法的生物

translation.en: They taught him the true potential of creativity.
translation.zh: 他们教会了他真正的创造潜力

translation.en: The Create-A-Crittles.
translation.zh: 创意渣渣秀

translation.en: [narrator] Little did David know,
translation.zh: 然而大卫并不知道

translation.en: he started a friendship that could never end.
translation.zh: 他开始了一段无法结束的友谊

translation.en: The world just isn't ready for the Create-A-Crittles.
translation.zh: 世界还没有进步到能接纳创意渣渣

translation.en: So David must keep them a secret from everyone, especially his family.
translation.zh: 所以大卫不能让别人知道他们 尤其是他的家人

translation.en: Oh no, please not tonight. No, not tonight.
translation.zh: 拜托 今晚别闹啊 千万别在今晚闹

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: -Oh, hi. Is Fifi asleep? -Yep.
translation.zh: 嗨 菲菲睡了吗？

translation.en: Are you prepared
translation.zh: -是啊 -你准备好

translation.en: for your big corporate project meeting in the morning?
translation.zh: 明天早上的公司重要项目会议了吗？

translation.en: -Yep. -I know you'll close the deal.
translation.zh: -是啊 -我就知道你一定能行

translation.en: Yeah, I just gotta do one last thing and take out the trash.
translation.zh: 嗯 我还有件事没做 然后就去扔垃圾

translation.en: -Don't wait up for me. -[suspenseful music playing]
translation.zh: 别等我了

translation.en: It's Create-A-Crittle time--
translation.zh: 现在该开始创意渣渣了…

translation.en: [grunts] Crittles? Hello?
translation.zh: 渣渣？有人吗？

translation.en: David, we thought you bailed on us.
translation.zh: 大卫 我们还以为你抛弃我们了

translation.en: Sorry I'm late, Brusho. I've just been really busy today.
translation.zh: 对不起 我来迟了 刷刷 我今晚一直很忙

translation.en: Trying to snip us out of your life?
translation.zh: 想把我们从你的生命中剪去吗？

translation.en: Of course not, Scizzi.
translation.zh: 绝对没有 剪剪！

translation.en: Look, I love you guys. You give my life so much--
translation.zh: 听我说 我爱你们 你们让我的生命…

translation.en: Color?
translation.zh: 五彩斑斓？

translation.en: [laughs] Argie B, you said it.
translation.zh: 小艺熊 你说得太对了

translation.en: So here we are, my three best friends.
translation.zh: 你们真是我的三个最好的朋友

translation.en: -[purple bear struggling] -Oh, right. Pasto.
translation.zh: 对了 还有粘粘

translation.en: [Pasto, muffled] My eyes must've fallen out!
translation.zh: 我的眼睛肯定掉下来了！

translation.en: Pasto, come here. Let me help you out with that.
translation.zh: 来 我帮你

translation.en: Thank you, David.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 大卫

translation.en: Ugh. Oh no. Look at this. I ruined your project.
translation.zh: 糟了 怎么办 我毁掉了你们的作品

translation.en: No, you didn't ruin it. You fixed it.
translation.zh: 怎么会呢？ 是你修好了它

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah! And you mixed up all the colors!
translation.zh: 是啊！所有的颜色都调得恰到好处！

translation.en: [chuckles] This is why I love you guys. You're so creative.
translation.zh: 我真的好喜欢你们 你们太有创意了

translation.en: You aren't afraid to make a big mess.
translation.zh: 你们不怕事情被弄糟

translation.en: Because that's where you find the masterpiece.
translation.zh: 佳作正来源于一团乱麻

translation.en: [David] So, what do you call this mess? I mean, um, masterpiece?
translation.zh: 你们怎么称呼这团东西？ 我是说 这件佳作

translation.en: This is Paste-or, the giant robot from my solo show that opens tomorrow.
translation.zh: 这是粘大师 是我明天个人秀要用到的巨型机器人

translation.en: -What? -You remember.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你还记得吧

translation.en: You're the guest of honor.
translation.zh: 你可是特邀嘉宾

translation.en: Yeah, you can count on me, Pasto. I'll be there.
translation.zh: 嗯嗯 包在我身上 粘粘 我会去的

translation.en: I'm counting on you. Look, and here's your ticket.
translation.zh: 我就指望你了 给你门票

translation.en: It's very big for a ticket.
translation.zh: 这张票好大

translation.en: -Wow! I love these bubble letters. -Yeah. Brusho did the bubble letters.
translation.zh: 哇！我好喜欢这些泡泡字体 那是刷刷写的

translation.en: Oh, well, they're really cool.
translation.zh: 真的很棒呢

translation.en: I know, but honestly, I did have a little inspiration.
translation.zh: 我知道 不过说实话 我有个小想法

translation.en: Here. Have some Crittle Glitter. [giggles]
translation.zh: 给 来点创意渣渣粉

translation.en: Oh, uh, not tonight, 'cause tomorrow morning I got that big corporate project meeting.
translation.zh: 今晚不行呢 明天早上我有公司重要项目会议

translation.en: Oh, you're going through with that corporate project?
translation.zh: 你要做公司项目？

translation.en: 'Cause I thought you knew that if you did that,
translation.zh: 我以为你知道 如果你去做项目

translation.en: we'd never talk to you again.
translation.zh: 我们就再也不会和你说话了

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding. That corporate project sounds cool.
translation.zh: 逗你的 公司项目听起来很厉害哦

translation.en: Hey, stay here, have one cream soda, then we'll let you get to bed.
translation.zh: 在这儿喝杯奶油苏打水 然后我们就让你去睡觉

translation.en: [chuckles] I knew you guys would understand. One cream soda, please.
translation.zh: 我就知道你们能理解 一杯奶油苏打水 谢谢

translation.en: -[cans click open] -We're totally good.
translation.zh: 我们完全不介意

translation.en: [Argie B] Oh my gosh, guys!
translation.zh: 天呐 各位！

translation.en: You wanna see my dance?
translation.zh: 想看我跳舞吗？

translation.en: David! David. David. David.
translation.zh: 大卫！

translation.en: We've invited you to this big corporate project meeting
translation.zh: 我们诚邀你参加这个 公司重要项目会议

translation.en: based on the strength of your portfolio.
translation.zh: 因为你的作品十分优秀

translation.en: It's very creative.
translation.zh: 非常有创意

translation.en: Yeah. Creative. [chuckles] You know what they say,
translation.zh: 是的 很有创意 俗话说得好

translation.en: you gotta make a big mess to find the masterpiece.
translation.zh: 佳作源于一团乱麻

translation.en: -[executive 1] Make a big mess? -David Gnubbens!
translation.zh: -一团乱麻？ -大卫纳笨斯！

translation.en: This corporation has rules.
translation.zh: 公司有公司的规定

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. It's, uh, it's just a… a metaphor.
translation.zh: 别误会 这只是个比喻

translation.en: I'm not making a… a literal mess. No, no. [chuckles nervously] I'll be good.
translation.zh: 我不是真的瞎搞 真的 我会守规矩的

translation.en: Very well, David, very well.
translation.zh: 很好 大卫 很好

translation.en: Now, we're going to take a chance on you and allow you to work
translation.zh: 我们想给你一个机会 让你试试

translation.en: on the crown jewel of our empire, the Bumpy B Subs logo.
translation.zh: 设计集团的明珠 奔波B的标识

translation.en: Oh wow, I've always loved the Bumpy's logo.
translation.zh: 哇喔 我一直都很喜欢奔波的标识

translation.en: It's so simple.
translation.zh: 非常简单

translation.en: [gasps] He thinks it looks simple?
translation.zh: 他觉得看起来简单？

translation.en: [executive 2] This logo took decades to perfect.
translation.zh: 这个标识花了数十年打磨

translation.en: When we tried a version with serif, our stock dropped 700%.
translation.zh: 我们用有衬线字体的时候 股价跌了7倍

translation.en: The last designer who worked on it killed himself!
translation.zh: 最后一个设计这个标识的人自杀了！

translation.en: So, David, are you willing to dedicate your life to the Bumpy B?
translation.zh: 那么 大卫 你愿意为字母B献身吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Well, then prove it…
translation.zh: -我愿意 先生 -证明给我们看…

translation.en: by eating this bowl of barf.
translation.zh: 把这碗呕吐物吃了

translation.en: [chuckles nervously] Is this a joke?
translation.zh: 开玩笑的吧？

translation.en: Ah. Very well. Nice to know you. Kickoff over. Have a nice day.
translation.zh: 很好 很高兴认识你 滚吧 日安

translation.en: No, no, no! I'll do it! I'll eat it! I'll eat the barf. I'll do it!
translation.zh: -别 我吃！我吃！ -再见 我吃！我吃就是了！

translation.en: -[chuckles] David! David, we're kidding! -[executives laughing]
translation.zh: 大卫 我们逗你的啦

translation.en: -Oh golly. Oh yeah. -You passed the test.
translation.zh: -太好了 -你通过测试了

translation.en: We're not monsters.
translation.zh: 我们又不是怪物

translation.en: We just love the Bumpy B more than anything.
translation.zh: 我们只是太爱奔波B了

translation.en: Oh, no, no. [laughs]
translation.zh: 吓死我了

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是啊

translation.en: Oh, you guys really got me. I thought that was real barf.
translation.zh: 你们真的吓死我了 我以为那真的是一碗呕吐物

translation.en: Well, the barf is real.
translation.zh: 确实是真的

translation.en: Oh, and it has been sitting out for some time.
translation.zh: 已经放那儿有一段时间了

translation.en: Flanagan, please throw this in the rubbish and prepare David's contract.
translation.zh: 佛兰纳根 麻烦你把它倒掉 再准备一下大卫的合同

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[wife, on phone] Hello?
translation.zh: -有人吗？ -亲爱的 我有好消息！

translation.en: [David] Honey, I've got great news! I'm designing the new Bumpy B!
translation.zh: -有人吗？ -亲爱的 我有好消息！ 我要设计奔波B的新标识了！

translation.en: -[wife] Brilliant! -This calls for champagne!
translation.zh: -太棒了！ -得开香槟庆祝一下

translation.en: Oh, this is the life. Hey, hon, how's it going in there?
translation.zh: 这才是人生啊 亲爱的 怎么样了？

translation.en: [wife] Be right out!
translation.zh: 马上来！

translation.en: [in sensual voice] Look, the strap on my outfit broke.
translation.zh: 你看 我的肩带断了

translation.en: Do you have any paste?
translation.zh: 你有胶水吗？

translation.en: I'll paste it back on and give you a show.
translation.zh: 我把它粘好 然后给你表演一段

translation.en: Paste. Show. [gasps]
translation.zh: 胶水 表演

translation.en: Pasto's show.
translation.zh: 粘粘秀

translation.en: Oh no, um, uh… You know what?
translation.zh: 糟了 对了

translation.en: I think I have to go outside and, uh, uh, take out the trash.
translation.zh: 我要出去扔个垃圾

translation.en: [in sensual voice] Now, David, don't you think the trash can wait?
translation.zh: 大卫 扔垃圾可以等一等吧？

translation.en: Trust me, I can compete with a smelly bag of trash.
translation.zh: 相信我 我可比臭垃圾香

translation.en: You know what, actually?
translation.zh: 其实吧

translation.en: I think I'm gonna like not taking out the trash.
translation.zh: 不扔垃圾也行

translation.en: Now where's that paste?
translation.zh: 胶水在哪儿呢？

translation.en: [sniffles] Well, I guess David hates me.
translation.zh: 看来大卫讨厌我

translation.en: David doesn't hate you. It was that evil corporate project meeting.
translation.zh: 大卫不讨厌你 他只是被公司项目会议拖住了

translation.en: It's turned him corporate!
translation.zh: 他屈服于商业化了！

translation.en: Hey, uh, I don't want to stand. Can I take David's seat?
translation.zh: 我不想站着 可以坐大卫的座位吗？

translation.en: No, no, no! He still might come.
translation.zh: 不行！他还是可能会来的

translation.en: You know the rules. No late entry. Now, Pasto, show us what you got.
translation.zh: 你知道规矩 不准迟到 粘粘 快开始你的表演吧

translation.en: All right, Paste-or and I welcome you to the greatest… [voice breaks]
translation.zh: 好吧 欢迎来看粘大师和我的超赞

translation.en: …funnest… [sobs]
translation.zh: 超有趣

translation.en: …coolest show ever! [sobbing]
translation.zh: 超酷的表演！

translation.en: [sobbing] The Pasto Show!
translation.zh: 粘粘秀！

translation.en: Hey, Treybor, I bet if I gave you a ten-second head start,
translation.zh: 嘿 特雷伯 我敢打赌 我让你十秒

translation.en: you couldn't beat me in a race.
translation.zh: 你也跑不过我

translation.en: Yeah, right. I've always been the faster twin.
translation.zh: 拉倒吧 我一直是双胞胎里 跑得快的那个

translation.en: You're on.
translation.zh: 比就比

translation.en: Okay. On your mark, get set, go!
translation.zh: 好 各就各位 预备 跑！

translation.en: I want my mommy! [grunts]
translation.zh: 我要妈妈！

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四、五、六、七、八 九、十！

translation.en: Hey, Treyb, I'm actually kinda jealous. You never told me you were taking a trip.
translation.zh: 嘿 特雷伯 我其实有点嫉妒你 你居然偷偷去旅行

translation.en: Ow. That wasn't cool, man.
translation.zh: 太过分了

translation.en: But you know what is cool?
translation.zh: 给你看个厉害的

translation.en: This super S.M.A.S.H.!-clusive movie preview
translation.zh: 大乱秀超级大电影的预告

translation.en: from your favorite star, Johnny Rash!
translation.zh: 由你最喜欢的明星强尼拉什带来！

translation.en: Check it out.
translation.zh: 请欣赏

translation.en: Hey, I'm Johnny Rash on the set of my new movie,
translation.zh: 嘿 我是强尼拉什 这里是我的新电影的片场

translation.en: and you've never seen or heard me quite like this before.
translation.zh: 这次的我是你们从未见过或听过的

translation.en: -[girls] We love you, Johnny. [smooch] -Ah, shut up. Check it out.
translation.zh: 我们爱你 强尼 别说啦 请欣赏

translation.en: [narrator] Tyler's new in town,
translation.zh: 泰勒初来乍到

translation.en: and he's about to learn that high school
translation.zh: 他很快就会发现高中

translation.en: isn't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.zh: 并没有想象中那么欢乐

translation.en: -We have a new student. His name is Tyler. -[class laughing]
translation.zh: 我们有位新同学 他叫泰勒

translation.en: [narrator] But there's something a little different about Tyler.
translation.zh: 但是泰勒有些与众不同

translation.en: He's a Rollerblader.
translation.zh: 他是一名轮滑爱好者

translation.en: My skates!
translation.zh: 我的轮滑鞋！

translation.en: [narrator] And when you Rollerblade at Hamilton High,
translation.zh: 当你在汉密尔顿高中溜旱冰

translation.en: you don't exactly fit in.
translation.zh: 你是无法被大家接受的

translation.en: Here. Take this.
translation.zh: 这个你拿着

translation.en: A skateboard?
translation.zh: 滑板？

translation.en: [narrator] But skateboarding isn't Tyler's only problem.
translation.zh: 但是滑板并不是泰勒遇到的唯一难题

translation.en: -[Tyler screams] -[narrator] He's got a royally big secret.
translation.zh: 因为他还有一个惊天大秘密

translation.en: Lauren, I have to be honest about something.
translation.zh: 劳伦 有件事我要和你坦白

translation.en: Yeah, tell me anything.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: As you can see, I am…
translation.zh: 你也发现了 我…

translation.en: not a fan of pizza.
translation.zh: 不喜欢披萨

translation.en: [narrator] But his luck is about to change when Tyler finds…
translation.zh: 但泰勒即将转运 因为他发现了

translation.en: [narrator] …one million dollars.
translation.zh: 一百万美元

translation.en: Eat my dust, Jacob!
translation.zh: 跟在我屁股后面跑吧 雅克布！

translation.en: [narrator] But it's going to take a lot more than money…
translation.zh: 但钱根本不足以…

translation.en: You used to be different.
translation.zh: 你以前很与众不同

translation.en: [narrator] …to win over the girl of Tyler's dreams.
translation.zh: …赢得泰勒梦中情人的青睐

translation.en: Now you're like everyone else.
translation.zh: 现在也变成俗人了

translation.en: Come on, Lauren. Clearly I'm different than everyone else.
translation.zh: 拜托 劳伦 你一眼就能看出 我和其他人不一样

translation.en: Look at me. I'm…
translation.zh: 你看 我…

translation.en: inside a sports car.
translation.zh: 坐在一辆跑车里

translation.en: [narrator] And his world's about to turn upside down when he finds out…
translation.zh: 他的生活即将发生翻天覆地的变化 当他发现…

translation.en: I'm on the Skyhawks?
translation.zh: 我怎么进了天鹰队？

translation.en: Hey, Tyler, when the game's on the line, I'm passing you the rock.
translation.zh: 嘿 泰勒 一会儿比赛开始 我就把球传给你

translation.en: Mo Jones knows my name?
translation.zh: 莫琼斯竟然知道我的名字？

translation.en: [narrator] But before he steps on the court, he's gotta go back in time…
translation.zh: 但在他上场之前 先得穿越回以前…

translation.en: Okay, now you dudes look weird.
translation.zh: 你们俩也太奇怪了

translation.en: -[narrator] …and then go forward in time. -Whoa! Huh?
translation.zh: …再穿越到现在

translation.en: Hey, teach, my report's gonna be a little
translation.zh: 老师 我的报告会有点

translation.en: different.
translation.zh: 与众不同哦

translation.en: [playing rock music] ♪ That's why class is dismissed ♪
translation.zh: 所以下课啦

translation.en: Hey, Martinez, not bad.
translation.zh: 嘿 吉他弹得不赖嘛

translation.en: Here, you know what to do with this.
translation.zh: 这个给你 你知道该怎么做

translation.en: He's…
translation.zh: 他…

translation.en: -[grunts] -…amazing.
translation.zh: 好厉害哦！

translation.en: -[mellow music playing] -[narrator] Matt Hartwell, Lottie Wolfe,
translation.zh: 马特哈特威尔 洛迪沃夫 （洛迪沃夫）

translation.en: the Spider Brothers, and Johnny Rash as…
translation.zh: 蜘蛛兄弟 以及强尼拉什扮演

translation.en: the Video Game Master.
translation.zh: 电子游戏大师

translation.en: You forgot to mention one thing.
translation.zh: 你忘了一件事

translation.en: I'm…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: a ninth-grader.
translation.zh: 九年级在读

translation.en: Whoa, that movie looks zuzzy zazz.
translation.zh: 那部电影看起来很酷哦

translation.en: -What? -What's wrong?
translation.zh: -什么？ -怎么了？

translation.en: Still want your mommy?
translation.zh: 还想找妈妈呢？

translation.en: [in slow motion voice] I want my mommy!
translation.zh: 我要妈妈！

translation.en: I was just trying to make you laugh.
translation.zh: 我只是想逗你笑而已

translation.en: No, you weren't.
translation.zh: 才不是

translation.en: Yeah, I was.
translation.zh: 就是

translation.en: All right, we got some great cartoons next week,
translation.zh: 下周我们将带来精彩的动画片

translation.en: including a brand-new Strongimals!
translation.zh: 包括新一集《大力动物》！

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm on it.
translation.zh: 没错 我也有参演哦

translation.en: -You're what? -Yup.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你没听错

translation.en: The Skipster's doing a voice.
translation.zh: 斯吉普小哥要配音

translation.en: I wonder what I'll look like all cartoonified.
translation.zh: 不知道我的卡通形象会是什么样呢

translation.en: Wow, that's, um…
translation.zh: 这还真是…

translation.en: Good… Good for you, Skip. That's great.
translation.zh: 恭喜你啊 斯吉普 真了不起

translation.en: Until next week, kids.
translation.zh: 孩子们 下周见啦 记住

translation.en: Remember, you're never too old to yell,
translation.zh: 孩子们 下周见啦 记住 不管多大 你都可以喊“我要妈妈！”

translation.en: "I want my mommy!" [laughs]
translation.zh: 不管多大 你都可以喊“我要妈妈！”
